TEAM UP: SAGE, TRINARY: If Cypher and all listed friendly characters are on the map, they take a maximum of 1 damage from characters with the Robot keyword's attacks. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering, Characters
I'VE DESIGNED ALL OF KRAKOA'S DEFENSES: Barrier, Toughness. When Cypher uses Barrier, after resolutions you may knock back any number of opposing characters adjacent to his Barrier markers 2 squares each.

He came in handy in a Battle Royale as a solid support piece. The Perplex is nice, and that Barrier is fun when you can pull it off. TK is always useful. Very solid support piece with great keywords.
